name: Jay and Silent Bob: Mall Brawl
overview: Classic retro beat-em-up with contemporary design. Play as Jay and Silent Bob in a retro 8-bit sidescrolling brawler. Go solo or team up with a friend. Pummel enemies with hard-hitting combos, dash attacks, and elbow drops as well as a random assortment of weapons as you battle your way out of the mall and back to the Quickstop. Jay and Silent Bob: Mall Brawl features 2 player co-op action with an 8-bit aesthetic and gameplay style similar to action brawlers on the (NES), particularly River City Ransom (1989) and Double Dragon II (1988). Snoochie boochies!
